event.title: Fellowship Meeting in Berlin in June
event.body:
The local Fellowship group will meet on June 11th at the NewThinkingStore at Tucholskystra√üe 48.
Torsten will give a presentation about the free OpenStreetMap project, outlining its progress, motivating people to join. Besides that the topics Linuxtag and our campaign regarding the "Bundestagswahl" will be discussed.
Guests are welcome to join in and chat about issues around Free Software.
